link.desc: Catgirls run tne internet, don't ever forget that. (Also check out the video he's done on this, it's a fun ride)

link.title: The burning of the Library of Alexandria for fandoms

link.desc: This is heartbreaking, Brazilians run basically every fan account on the internet
